channel.title: Server client that has quests?
channel.description: I am trying to run my own server for me and some friends and sooner or later everyone who wants to play. But I cant seem to find a server client that has quests or how to add quests? Can anyone help me?

item.title: Server client that has quests?
item.dc:creator: @mustbaj mustbaj
item.description:
@mustbaj wrote:

Thank you I will try to find it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2009, 04:23:06 pm[/size][hr]The thing is. That I just want either a download link or maybe someone to help me. I want a server i can host with lots of quests and npcs like store people! and things to fight and kill! And how come some servers you cant edit the server.java and change the ip in there to my ip and host it? On some you can.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2009, 04:50:52 pm[/size][hr]do you mean project16? I cant find project19. I just want a server close to the real rs.

Read full topic

item.title: Server client that has quests?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:9, topic:295667”][quote author=Spades link=topic=391662.msg2917119#msg2917119 date=1250532445]

how would i do that?

There is a server with working quests, I believe it is called Project19. I don’t know where to download it. Try google’ing it.
[/quote]

Quests are damn easy to make. Just requires some skill, I don’t know why people make it sound so fucking hard.[/quote]

So instead of telling him how to make them you just laugh in his face cause he doesn’t know how to make them? Your post is retarded, it doesn’t help him in any way. Before you reply to this post don’t even bother, not here to fight with you, just to point out how much of a dick you made yourself. I helped him by pointing him in the direction of a server that has quests already coded into them. Your post was pretty much pointless.

Read full topic

item.title: Server client that has quests?

[/quote]

There is a server with working quests, I believe it is called Project19. I don’t know where to download it. Try google’ing it.[/quote]

item.title: Server client that has quests?
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

You can always be a noob and leech delta scape’s quests, or learn and get better with coding by looking at a premade quest in delta-scape or some other server and then develop your own quest…
